wait

public java.lang.Boolean wait(java.lang.Integer id,
                              java.lang.Integer timeoutPeriod)
                       throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
Wait for the end of a long running method that was called using 'post'

Parameters:
id - The ID of the method that was returned when calling the method using 'post'
timeoutPeriod - The timeout period in ms. To wait indefinately, use a timeoutPeriod of zero.
Returns:
True if the timeout period terminated. False if the method returned.
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException

installBehavior

public java.lang.Boolean installBehavior(java.lang.String localPath)
                                  throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                                         java.lang.InterruptedException
Install a behavior. Check the given local path for a valid behavior or package. On success, behavior added or updated signal is emitted. DEPRECATED in favor of PackageManager.install.

Parameters:
localPath - the relative destination path.
Returns:
true on success, false on failure.
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException

installBehavior

public java.lang.Boolean installBehavior(java.lang.String absolutePath,
                                         java.lang.String localPath,
                                         java.lang.Boolean overwrite)
                                  throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                                         java.lang.InterruptedException
Install a behavior. Check and take the behavior found at the given absolute path andimport it to the given local path, relative to behaviors path. On success, behavior added signal is emitted before returning.DEPRECATED in favor of PackageManager.install.

Parameters:
absolutePath - a behavior on the local file system to install.
localPath - the relative destination path.
overwrite - whether to replace existing behavior if present.
Returns:
true on success, false on failure.
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException
